tags.name: actions
tags.doc: This tag a group of [tag forms]submit-button[/tag] or other controls that will be rendered as a group (typically a single row).
tags.synopsis: mark a group of action buttons in a form
tags.example:
<actions>
            <submit-button name="action" clicked="delete" text="Delete"/>
            <submit-button name="action" clicked="cancel" text="Cancel"/>
        </actions>

tags.name: adapt-field
tags.synopsis: adapt a field in a form

tags.name: add-choices
tags.doc: Add choices to a [tag]select[/tag] or [tag]check-select[/tag].
tags.synopsis: add choices to a select tag

tags.name: apply
tags.doc:
Applying a form will copy data from a form (in [c]src[/c]) to an object ([c]dst[/c]).

The name of the values to copy are specified in the [c]dst[/c] attribute of field attributes.
tags.synopsis: apply a form to an object

tags.name: apply-field
tags.doc:
Apply a form field.

Invoked by [tag forms]apply[/tag].
tags.synopsis: apply a form field

tags.name: bind
tags.doc: Bind a form to data
tags.synopsis: Add data to a form

src.name: src
src.doc: Source object to fill in fields (the form)

tags.name: check-select
tags.doc:
Add a [i]check select[/i] to a form.

A check select is an alternative to a multiple select ([tag forms]select[/tag]) which uses checkboxes rather than an input.
tags.synopsis: add a check select control to a form

process.name: process
process.doc: Function to process src in to a string

requiredmsg.name: requiredmsg
requiredmsg.doc: Field error text for required fields

adapt.name: adapt
adapt.doc: Function to adapt field before applying

required.name: required
required.doc: Is a value required for this field?

tags.name: checkbox
tags.doc: Add a checkbox to a form.
tags.synopsis: add a checkbox to a form

process.name: process
process.doc: Function to process src in to a string

requiredmsg.name: requiredmsg
requiredmsg.doc: Field error text for required fields

adapt.name: adapt
adapt.doc: Function to adapt field before applying

required.name: required
required.doc: Is a value required for this field?

tags.name: error
tags.doc: Set an error message on either a field or the entire form.
tags.synopsis: add an error message to a form
tags.example:
<forms:error src="form" if=".user">
            You must be logged in to do that!
        </forms:error>

tags.name: fail
tags.doc:
Used in a [tag forms]validate-feld[/tag], this tag marks a field as having failed validation, and sets an error message.

Note that this tag acts like a [tag]return[/tag].
tags.synopsis: set a fail in a form validation
tags.example:
<validate-field field="price">
            <fail if="value lte 0>
                Price must be greater than 0.00.
            </fail>
        </validate-field>

tags.name: field
tags.doc: This tag adds a field to the form object, but defers the rendering to enclosed content.
tags.synopsis: add a custom field to a form

process.name: process
process.doc: Function to process src in to a string

requiredmsg.name: requiredmsg
requiredmsg.doc: Field error text for required fields

adapt.name: adapt
adapt.doc: Function to adapt field before applying

required.name: required
required.doc: Is a value required for this field?

tags.name: form
tags.doc: Defines a form.
tags.synopsis: begin a form definition
tags.example:
<form libname="form.login" legend="Please login" xmlns="http://moyaproject.com/forms">
            <input name="username" label="Username" type="text" maxlength="30" required="yes"/>
            <password name="password" label="Password" maxlength="30" required="yes"/>
            <submit-button text="Login" />
        </form>

tags.name: get
tags.doc: Get a form object.
tags.synopsis: get a form

src.name: src
src.doc: Source object to fill in fields

tags.name: group
tags.doc: Renders a group of form elements
tags.synopsis: render a group of form elements

tags.name: hidden-input
tags.doc: Add a hidden input to a form.
tags.synopsis: add a hidden input value to a form

tags.doc: Add an optgroup (heading for options) to a select.

tags.name: option
tags.doc: Define an option in a select input.

tags.synopsis: add a password field to a form

tags.name: radio
tags.doc:
Add a radio button to a form.

The user will be able to select just one radio button with the same [c]name[/c] attribute.
tags.synopsis: add a radio button to a field

process.name: process
process.doc: Function to process src in to a string

requiredmsg.name: requiredmsg
requiredmsg.doc: Field error text for required fields

adapt.name: adapt
adapt.doc: Function to adapt field before applying

required.name: required
required.doc: Is a value required for this field?

tags.name: radio-group
tags.doc: Add a radio group (container for radio buttons) to a form.
tags.synopsis: add a radio group to a form
tags.example:
<radio-group name="option" label="Radio Group" required="yes">
            <radio text="Option 1" on="1"/>
            <radio text="Option 2" on="2"/>
            <radio text="Option 3" on="3"/>
        </radio-group>

tags.name: validate
tags.doc:
Validates a form

If the form is passes all of the validate tests in the form, the Attribute
'ok' will be True and the containing logic will be execute.
tags.synopsis: validate a form

tags.name: validate-field
tags.doc: Define validation code for a field in a form.
tags.synopsis: validate a field in a form
tags.example:
<validate-field field="price">
            <fail if="value lte 0>
                Price must be greater than 0.00.
            </fail>
        </validate-field>

tags.name: validate-post
tags.doc:
Validate a form if the current request is a POST request.

This tag does the same thing as [tag]validate[/tag], but only if the current request is a POST request. Otherwise, the enclosed block will be skipped.
tags.synopsis: validate a form for post requests
